title: How can we restore a contact chat history from WhatsApp? - Quora

response.answer_text: Practically its not possible to restore chat history of a specific Contact on WhatsApp. Because all the backup are in the unreadable format, you can not read backup file wherein Chat History is stored. One more thing, if you want to get individual Chat History, then you can get it through ‘Email Chat’ option in WhatsApp. For this do the following steps: Open the chat for the individual or group.Tap the Menu Button.Tap More.Tap Email chat.Choose whether to Attach Media or not.An email will be composed with your chat history attached as a .txt document. For more details,read the FAQ for restoring chat history with contacts on the official website of WhatsApp. Thanks Raj
